description:
Ushio does not deal a finishing blow to Heine. Making matters worse, Shide also stands in their way and plans to end the world by gaining the Eye of the Observer. In an attempt to seize the Eye of the Observer, Shide slices open Heine`s stomach and drags Ushio to where Heine came from. Though Ushio tries to settle the score on her own, Shinpei chases after her.
Source: Disney+
